title: 69: Bachelor in Paradise: Week 2 (Part 3 & 4)
itunes:title: 69: Bachelor in Paradise: Week 2 (Part 3 & 4)
description:
The Broads are here to recap the second week in Paradise and spill some tea (for real though…)! They talk their favorite couple that has ever existed, Demi and Tanner’s twitter drama, Cam’s view of marriage, Blake/Hannah/Dylan triangle, Clay/Nicole/Christian triangle, Dean’s van, and much more!
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com
Thank you to our sponsors:

***FAB FIT FUN: Use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at ​www.fabfitfun.com​! #fabfitfunpartner
